title: 1Word Wearable - (KJV) Bible
summary: Wearable Bible Reader designed to make tagging and highlighting easy and fun
description: This application is a standalone Bible Reader (KJV) for Android Wearable devices.  The Bible is called the Word, this app was developed to quickly look up verses in the bible with a click of a word. Easy to use tag feature to store all your favorite verses or verses related to a certain topic.  Hopefully it will bring encouragement to those who need it. * Timed notifications ( great for new Android Wear  and smartwatch) * Key word searches make reading fun and exciting * Topical searches * Share scripture with friends * Highlight verses * Quickly sort highlights by chosen color * Add notes to verses for deeper interaction * Favorite verses for easy lookup * Web searching * Scroll through every word in the word for a deeper connection with your creator
descriptionHTML:
This application is a standalone Bible Reader (KJV) for Android Wearable devices. The Bible is called the Word, this app was developed to quickly look up verses in the bible with a click of a word. Easy to use tag feature to store all your favorite verses or verses related to a certain topic. Hopefully it will bring encouragement to those who need it.

* Timed notifications ( great for new Android Wear and smartwatch)
* Key word searches make reading fun and exciting
* Topical searches
* Share scripture with friends
* Highlight verses
* Quickly sort highlights by chosen color
* Add notes to verses for deeper interaction
* Favorite verses for easy lookup
* Web searching
* Scroll through every word in the word for a deeper connection with your creator
comments: This is it! I've been looking everywhere for an app that allows me to freely read the Word without giving me only a verse at a time not of my choosing. This is absolutely perfect! Now we just need more translations :)
Great! Just one thing font size if it were the next size larger it will be a 5 star app my eyes aren't what they used to be. Bless You for making this app for Android wear.

Woow!!!!  What can i say? This is an excellent work, thank God for your efforts Developer.... This is a very good job, may God grant you the grace even to do more to His Glory.....     This a good app, well there is something missing in the book of John, there are missing scriptures, like in the book of John 3:, John 4, all  need to be updated , because they are ending on the 21st Verse but in the actual sense, they go beyond.
A True Blessing It's a true Blessing 2 have the Bible on my smartwatch. It great encouragement when I'm @ work. I pray 2 see more apps like this. God bless.
Boom 1 of the most interesting Apps 4 Android wear.    Great stuff.
recentChanges: * Fixed bug when selecting searched verses
* Added WatchFace -Displays time as well as random verse with each glance
* Added color selection from mobile app
